titleStmt.title: The rights of primogeniture, or, The excellency of royall authority in a sermon preached before His Majesty in the Isle of Wight, upon the anniversary of his birth-day / by James, L. Bishop of Armagh and Primate of Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
